item.title: Cloud economics
item.description: The cloud introduces new business models and economics as companies shift their expenditure, spending less money on setting up (e.g., servers) and more money on operations instead.

item.title: Cloud computing
item.description: The delivery of services over the internet. Also defined as a model for enabling ubiquitous, convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction.
